import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import SEOHead from './SEOHead'; import { Mail, Phone, Linkedin, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Send, MessageCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState<'idle' | 'success' | 'error'>('idle'); const [submitMessage, setSubmitMessage] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setSubmitStatus('idle'); setSubmitMessage(''); try { // Send data to Activepieces webhook const response = await fetch('https://cloud.activepieces.com/api/v1/webhooks/2GjCUtFPEUQL5OnqD7gqR', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ fullName: formData.fullName, email: formData.email, phone: formData.phone, company: formData.company, service: formData.service, message: formData.message, timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), source: 'contact-form' }), }); if (response.ok) { // Success setSubmitStatus('success'); setSubmitMessage('شكرًا لك، تم استلام رسالتك بنجاح.'); // Clear form data setFormData({ fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); } else { throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error submitting form:', error); setSubmitStatus('error'); setSubmitMessage('حدث خطأ أثناء إرسال الرسالة. يرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى أو التواصل معنا مباشرة.'); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; return (
{/* Page Header */}
